sqlMap.select: SELECT row_number() OVER() AS row , * FROM (SELECT * FROM f_rpt_ar('currency=CNY:customerid=$customerid$:feeItemid=$feeItemid$:datetype=$datetype$:dateastart=$dateastart$:dateend=$dateend$:jobnos=$jobnos$:vessel=$vessel$:voyage=$voyage$:saleid=$saleid$:ifcommission=$ifcommission$:settled=$settled$:checkid=$checkid$') WHERE $qry$ $ord$) AS T LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$

SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM f_rpt_ar('currency=CNY:customerid=$customerid$:feeItemid=$feeItemid$:datetype=$datetype$:dateastart=$dateastart$:dateend=$dateend$:jobnos=$jobnos$:vessel=$vessel$:voyage=$voyage$:saleid=$saleid$:ifcommission=$ifcommission$:settled=$settled$:checkid=$checkid$') WHERE $qry$

SELECT row_number() OVER() AS row , * FROM (SELECT * FROM f_rpt_ap('currency=CNY:customerid=$customerid$:feeItemid=$feeItemid$:datetype=$datetype$:dateastart=$dateastart$:dateend=$dateend$:jobnos=$jobnos$:vessel=$vessel$:voyage=$voyage$:saleid=$saleid$:ifcommission=$ifcommission$:settled=$settled$:paymenttype=$paymenttype$:checkid=$checkid$') WHERE $qry$ $ord$) AS T LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$

SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM f_rpt_ap('currency=CNY:customerid=$customerid$:feeItemid=$feeItemid$:datetype=$datetype$:dateastart=$dateastart$:dateend=$dateend$:jobnos=$jobnos$:vessel=$vessel$:voyage=$voyage$:saleid=$saleid$:ifcommission=$ifcommission$:settled=$settled$:paymenttype=$paymenttype$:checkid=$checkid$') WHERE $qry$

SELECT row_number() OVER() AS row , * FROM (SELECT * FROM f_rpt_porfit('currency=$currency$:datetype=$datetype$:dateastart=$dateastart$:dateend=$dateend$:jobnos=$jobnos$:impexp=$impexp$:jobtype=$jobtype$:isclc=$isclc$:bigticket=$bigticket$:checkid=$checkid$:ourcomp=$ourcomp$:saleid=$saleid$:othercomp=$othercomp$:customerid=$customerid$') WHERE $qry$ $ord$) AS T LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$

SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM f_rpt_porfit('currency=$currency$:datetype=$datetype$:dateastart=$dateastart$:dateend=$dateend$:jobnos=$jobnos$:impexp=$impexp$:jobtype=$jobtype$:isclc=$isclc$:bigticket=$bigticket$:checkid=$checkid$:ourcomp=$ourcomp$:saleid=$saleid$:othercomp=$othercomp$:customerid=$customerid$') WHERE $qry$
